scripts.build: yarn clean && parcel build settings.html index.html robots.txt offline.html --no-minify && sed -i '' 's/parcelRequire = (/var parcelRequire = (/g' dist/app.*.js && sed -i '' 's/parcelRequire = (/var parcelRequire = (/g' dist/setting.*.js && npx netlify deploy --prod --dir dist
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m 'd' && git push origin master
